text: Leif Haugen (22 September 1917 - 26 February 2001) was a Norwegian cross- country skier. He was born in Lillehammer, and represented the club Lillehammer SK. He competed in cross-country skiing at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==Cross-country skiing results== ===Olympic Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border-collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" ! style="background- color:#369; color:white; width:60px;"| Year ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:40px;"| Age ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 18 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 50 km ! style="background-color:#4180be; color:white; width:75px;"| 4 × 10 km relay |- | 1948 || 30 || — || || — |- |} ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Lillehammer Category:Norwegian male cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Norway Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics
title: Leif Haugen
